data.text:
INDUCTION COOKING PLATE HII64400MT

Glass ceramic INDUKCION cooking hob (60 cm)

ZAGRIJAVANJE ONLY IN ADDITION WITH A VESSEL WHICH READS ON THE INDUSTRIAL PLATE

BASIC CHARACTERISTICS

Type of plate: Glass ceramic

Control type: Electronic, thin touch controls on the front

Color: Black

Inox ram

Width: 60 cm

HEATING ZONE

Heating zones: 4 glass ceramic

Front left: 180 mm - 1800 W / 2300 W

Front right: 145 mm - 1600 W / 1800 W

Rear left: 180 mm - 2000 W / 2300 W

Rear Right: 210 mm - 2000 W / 2300 W

Operation indicator: Yes

Control levels: 0-9 per zone

Indicator of residual heat: Yes

Electronic locking of commands for children: Yes

Automatic Detection Function: Yes

Anti-overheating system: Yes

Cleaning lock: Yes

Timer and beep: Yes

Automatic shutdown: Yes

Spillover security: Yes
